abstract: A one-time password that the vehicle manufacturer provides.
overview:
## Discussion

When creating a digital car key, the vehicle manufacturer emails the user a one-time password to verify their identity. Set this property’s value to that password before you use the configuration to initialize [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKAddSecureElementPassViewController], and PassKit verifies that the passwords match as it creates the pass.

# password

**Instance Property**

A one-time password that the vehicle manufacturer provides.

## Declaration

```swift
var password: String { get set }
```

## Discussion

When creating a digital car key, the vehicle manufacturer emails the user a one-time password to verify their identity. Set this property’s value to that password before you use the configuration to initialize [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKAddSecureElementPassViewController], and PassKit verifies that the passwords match as it creates the pass.
title: password
